Are you sure you are posting that comment on the right torrent? There are no pars here.

Also pars exist for a reason. Mostly so you can be sure to get the correct file regardless of where you got it.

Tell me what program you used for parity and on what file in this archive you used it and I can likely tell you what went wrong. Seeing no parity files I really think you are on the wrong torrent. Good luck figuring it out anyway.

Upon attempting to "apply changes" in the options, it appears to do nothing and return your settings. Also, if changing settings, then attempting to exit the options, such as hitting the big X in the top right will crash the game with an error at future start ups, requiring a reinstall to fix.

Thank you!

This game is why I torrent shit. I'm a sucker for 4X games but this feels unfinished. It's buggy as fuck and simply lacks polish.

So for the hundredth time, thank you Stifmeister. Glad I didn't get suckered out of $30.

4X is a hard genre to get right. Too many games are obvious clones of other 4X games and because of that they never seem to bother to finish them.

I am still hopeful that this one will fix all the numerous bugs and make it good. But even if they do, it will still be inferior to Master of Orion.
